Welcome to our new One Chalhoub platform!  

While the name remains the same, we have designed an enhanced platform that promotes greater collaboration, engagement, and streamlined communication, providing you with the resources you need to thrive within the Group. 

With One Chalhoub, we are transitioning from multiple platforms to a social-first unified experience that puts you at the center. You'll notice a shift from static streams to vibrant, connected communities and spaces, fostering open conversations among our store consultants, leaders, and back-office team members.

chunks.text:
With One Chalhoub, we are transitioning from multiple platforms to a social-first unified experience that puts you at the center. You'll notice a shift from static streams to vibrant, connected communities and spaces, fostering open conversations among our store consultants, leaders, and back-office team members.  

We can’t wait to see you share all your news, announcements, articles, thought leadership pieces and more! 


Let’s get you started: 

1. Scan the QR Code above or open the link <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWQ7jVghCmLnWa0g2r%252fz7XSJBvKAzxzFVJ0YvYGjD6xNj5EL5hE7QPnDfVwUNhsv5vycDnBANakBx4JQpbTWISWUkAcyZDijGUpOUH%252bT0yyrGfR%252b%252fJ0FWti29eTXSsGZppydKG%252fP5a1TFD847IuBsgQow6FgW7lHB5ZRRa7PFjSS3J6noei04bx7%252breEJW0X2DxKUH6hUMtbErSN3V6LcI25aSaCQA2pt2y7WiencisdS&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C7d671fb66e6f4e5b46fe08dd03190453%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638670128179453499%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=DHdtUL%2FYBoPoenU3lRK6oqRXuSLn0n6WlS7UPPO5KRQ%3D&reserved=0>  on your desktop or mobile browser.

2. Click on "Sign in with ONE Chalhoub account" to log in.

   . Function - Your specific function 
   . Category – HR
   . Sub Category – OneChalhoub
